alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, east central Walton and Washington Counties through 445 PM EDT/345 PM CDT/... At 358 PM EDT/258 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles east of Vernon to 10 miles north of Panama City Beach. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Vernon, Chipley, Bradford, Live Oak, Wausau, Ebro, Brock Crossroad, Greenhead, Bruce, Red Head, Holmes Valley, Millers Ferry, Pine Log, Porter Lake, Smyrna, Spring Hollow, Poplar Head, Sylvania, Johnson Crossroads and Riverside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; Washington
